name: chain-equity
description: Tokenized Security Prototype with Compliance Gating

scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --broadcast
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.gas-benchmarks: cd contracts && forge test --gas-report > gas-report.txt && cd .. && ts-node scripts/gas-benchmarks.ts
